text.content:
{{> _header}}
 
Dear %%=v(FirstName)=%%,
{{#=if (([Persona] == "Restorative") && ([MessageCounter] == "1"))}}
{{= BeginImpressionRegion("01__Rule_1__Persona1-Msg1")}}

  Cancer-related fatigue is frequently said to be one of the most common and stressful symptoms of living with cancer. So, I wanted to pass along this link to information on cancer-related fatigue
http://www.cancercenter.com/nm/cancer-related-fatigue/?invsrc=nurture&utm_channel=email
that you may find helpful.

  To help you get started, I am including a link to a  web page
https://www.cancercenter.com/downtown-chicago/
 that contains information about the advanced treatment options available at our new CTCA(R) Outpatient Care Center, located in downtown Chicago. This new location is easy to travel to by public transportation or by car. You also have access to convenient parking.
 
{{= EndImpressionRegion()}}
{{.else}}
{{#=if (([Persona] == "Spiritual") && ([MessageCounter] == "1"))}}
{{= BeginImpressionRegion("01__Rule_2__Persona2-Msg1")}}
 
  As you continue to address your cancer care, I want to share valuable information I think you will find useful.  Please click on this link to learn about important options for managing pain
http://www.cancercenter.com/treatments/pain-management/?invsrc=nurture&utm_channel=email
 
{{= EndImpressionRegion()}}
{{.else}}
{{= BeginImpressionRegion("01__Default_Content__DefaultPersona-Msg1")}}
 
Thank you for taking the time to talk with me about your %%=Lowercase(@CancerType)=%% cancer diagnosis. My goal is to make sure you have the information you need to make an informed decision and are aware of the treatment options available to you at Cancer Treatment Centers of America(R) (CTCA).
 
To help you get started, I am including a link to a  web page
https://www.cancercenter.com/downtown-chicago/
 that contains information about the advanced treatment options available at our new CTCA(R) Outpatient Care Center, located in downtown Chicago. This new location is easy to travel to by public transportation or by car. You also have access to convenient.

{{= EndImpressionRegion()}}
{{/if}}
{{/if}}

  Unlike the fatigue most people may experience, cancer-related fatigue is a much more persistent exhaustion that cannot be relieved simply with a good night's rest. At Cancer Treatment Centers of America (R) (CTCA), we have teams of experts who work together with you to proactively manage side effects, including cancer-related fatigue. From our nutrition therapy team to our mind-body medicine team, CTCA (R) provides many supportive therapies to determine what can best help you find relief from side effects like fatigue. When side effects are minimized, you are more likely to feel strong, empowered and optimistic.
  

{{#=if (([CancerType] == "breast") && ([Persona] == "Restorative") && ([MessageCounter] == "1"))}}
{{= BeginImpressionRegion("02__Rule_1__Persona1-Breast-Msg1")}}
 
One important factor to keep in mind as you proceed with your  cancer treatment is the overall treatment results of the cancer center where you are receiving treatment. Clear and thorough information on survival, quality-of-life and patient satisfaction results can help you determine which provider may be best suited to treat your type of cancer. 

{{= EndImpressionRegion()}}
{{.else}}
{{#=if (([CancerType] == "colorectal") && ([Persona] == "Spiritual") && ([MessageCounter] == "1"))}}
{{= BeginImpressionRegion("02__Rule_2__Persona2-Collateral-Msg1")}}
 
Choosing the right hospital is one of the most important decisions you make in your cancer journey, and I want to commend you for exploring your treatment options. You deserve to find targeted treatment options available for your specific type of cancer, delivered by a team of experts. Understanding your options plays a key role in that decision

{{= EndImpressionRegion()}}
{{.else}}
{{= BeginImpressionRegion("02__Default_Content__DefaultPersona-DefaultCancerType")}}
 
Choosing the right hospital is one of the most important decisions you make in your cancer journey, and I want to commend you for exploring your treatment options. You deserve to find targeted treatment options available for your specific type of cancer, delivered by a team of experts. Understanding your options plays a key role in that decision

{{= EndImpressionRegion()}}
{{/if}}
{{/if}}
%%[IF (([CancerType] == "Leukemia - Acute Lymphatic ") AND ([MessageCounter] == "1")) THEN]%%
%%=BeginImpressionRegion("03__Rule_1__Cancer_Type-Leukemia_-_Acute_Lymphatic_-Msg1")=%%
 
My friend, I understand this is a complex topic. To help, I am linking to more information about the promise of precision cancer treatment, genomic testing and the benefits precision cancer treatment can offer. Whether precision cancer treatment is right for you is a decision you make with your medical team based on your individual situation. However, at CTCA(R), we believe that the more information you have, the better informed decisions you can make about your own cancer treatment.
 
%%=EndImpressionRegion()=%%
%%[ELSEIF (([CancerType] == "Leukemia, Blood") AND ([MessageCounter] == "1")) THEN]%%
%%=BeginImpressionRegion("03__Rule_2__Cancer_Type-Leukemia,_Blood-Msg1")=%%
 
Cancer Treatment Centers of America(R) (CTCA) sponsors this site to ensure that all patients, regardless of where they receive cancer treatment, have access to valuable information related to their cancer diagnosis, symptoms and treatment. If you would like to receive ongoing updates, you can also sign up to receive a weekly cancer newsletter
 
%%=EndImpressionRegion()=%%
%%[ELSE]%%

%%[ENDIF]%%
%%[IF (([CancerGroup] == "breast") AND ([MessageCounter] == "1")) THEN]%%
%%=BeginImpressionRegion("04__Rule_1__Breast-Msg1")=%%
 
Many organizations offer information and assistance to people living with cancer, but it's sometimes hard to know what resources can offer reliable and trustworthy support. Here is a list of excellent resources that can help you find information about cancer, treatment options, support groups in your community and financial and legal services. I encourage you to reach out to these organizations to learn how they can help you in your cancer journey. 
 
%%=EndImpressionRegion()=%%
%%[ELSEIF (([CancerGroup] == "colorectal") AND ([MessageCounter] == "1")) THEN]%%
%%=BeginImpressionRegion("04__Rule_2__Colorectal-Msg1")=%%
 
As we discussed, your next step is to complete the CTCA Authorization and Medical History forms. This process is easy to do online using the link below. If you do not have some of the information requested, simply save your work and return to it later. (For example, you should save your work if you need to stop to look up your doctorsâ€™ contact information.
 
%%=EndImpressionRegion()=%%
%%[ELSE]%%

%%[ENDIF]%%
%%[IF (([Status] == "Prospect") AND ([PhoneaDoc] == "0")) THEN]%%
%%=BeginImpressionRegion("05__Rule_1__LeadProspect-PhoneDoc_Value-Msg1")=%%
 
So that I can schedule your evaluation quickly, please complete these forms as soon as possible and note that after seven days, the link above will expire. If you need assistance or have questions, please contact me directly at my phone number or email address below. 
 
%%=EndImpressionRegion()=%%
%%[ELSEIF (([Status] == "Referred") AND ([PhoneaDoc] != "0")) THEN]%%
%%=BeginImpressionRegion("05__Rule_2__LeadReferred-PhoneDoc_Value-Msg1")=%%
 
So that I can schedule your evaluation quickly, please complete these forms as soon as possible and note that after seven days, the link above will expire. If you need assistance or have questions, please contact me directly at my phone number or email address below. 
 
%%=EndImpressionRegion()=%%
%%[ELSE]%%

%%[ENDIF]%%
%%[
var @TaggedTerm, @TileIndex, @nurtureSend , @href, @src, @LeadId,@Result, @temp,@rsContacts, @leadrows
set @LeadId = LeadId
set @TaggedTerm = SegmentTagTerms
Set @rsContacts= RetrieveSalesforceObjects('Lead', 'Nurture_Tile1_Counter__c', 'Id', '=' ,LeadId)
Set @leadrows = row(@rsContacts, 1)

/*Tile 1*/

Set @nurtureSend = field(@leadrows,'Nurture_Tile1_Counter__c')

IF(@TaggedTerm != "") THEN
IF( @nurtureSend == "") THEN

IF( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm, "Qualifications") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex = 1
set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1","Tile Index", @TileIndex)
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1",  "Tile Index", @TileIndex)

ELSEIF( IndexOf( @TaggedTerm,"DistrustMD") > 0 ) THEN
set @TileIndex = 2
set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1",  "Tile Index", @TileIndex)

ELSEIF ( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm,"Don't Feel in Control") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex = 3
set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)

ELSEIF ( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm,"Cutting Edge Tx.") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex = 4
set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)

ELSEIF ( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm,"Dissatisfied with Current Tx") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex = 5
set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)

ELSEIF ( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm,"Success Rates") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex = 6
set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)

ELSEIF ( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm,"Cutting Edge Tx") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex = 7
set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)

ELSEIF( IndexOf( @TaggedTerm,"Clinical Trials") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex = 8
set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex)

ELSE
set @TileIndex = 1
set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1","Tile Index", @TileIndex)
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1",  "Tile Index", @TileIndex)

ENDIF
ENDIF
ENDIF
 
IF( @nurtureSend != "") THEN
Set @rsContact= RetrieveSalesforceObjects('Lead', 'Nurture_Tile1_Counter__c', 'Id', '=' ,LeadId)
Set @leadrow = row(@rsContact, 1)
Set @TileIndex = field(@leadrow,'Nurture_Tile1_Counter__c')
set @temp = formatnumber(@TileIndex,"R")
set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @temp )
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @temp)
Set @TileIndex = formatnumber(@TileIndex,"N")

IF (@TileIndex > 7) THEN
set @Result= 1
ELSE
set @Result= Add(@TileIndex, 1)
ENDIF
set @Result = formatnumber(@Result,"N")
ENDIF

/*Tagged Term is blank for all tiles*/
IF(@TaggedTerm == "") THEN
IF(@nurtureSend1 == "") THEN

Set @TileIndex1 = 1

set @href = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex1)
set @src = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T1", "Tile Index", @TileIndex1)


ENDIF
ENDIF
ENDIF
ENDIF

]%%
 
%%=v(@href)=%%
 
%%[
var @TaggedTerm, @TileIndex,@LeadId,@Result, @temp
var @TileIndex2, @nurtureSend2 , @href2, @src2, @rsContacts2, @leadrows2,@temp
set @LeadId = LeadId
set @TaggedTerm = SegmentTagTerms
Set @rsContacts2 = RetrieveSalesforceObjects('Lead', 'Nurture_Tile2_Counter__c', 'Id', '=' ,LeadId)
Set @leadrows2 = row(@rsContacts2, 1)
Set @nurtureSend2 = field(@leadrows2,'Nurture_Tile2_Counter__c')
 
IF(@TaggedTerm != "") THEN
IF( @nurtureSend2 == "") THEN

IF( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm , "Treat the Whole Body") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex2 = 1
set @href2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T2","Tile Index", @TileIndex2)
set @src2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T2",  "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)

ELSEIF( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm , "No Life Interruptions") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex2 = 2
set @href2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T2","Tile Index", @TileIndex2)
set @src2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T2",  "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)

ELSEIF ( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm ,"Speed of Care/Urgency") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex2 = 3
set @href2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T2", "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)
set @src2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T2", "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)

ELSEIF ( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm,"Local Support") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex2 = 4
set @href2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T2", "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)
set @src2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T2", "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)

ELSEIF ( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm ,"Quality of Life") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex2 = 5
set @href2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T2", "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)
set @src2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T2", "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)

ELSE
set @TileIndex2 = 1
set @href2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T2","Tile Index", @TileIndex2)
set @src2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T2",  "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)

ENDIF
ENDIF
ENDIF
 
IF( @nurtureSend2 != "") THEN
Set @rsContact2= RetrieveSalesforceObjects('Lead', 'Nurture_Tile2_Counter__c', 'Id', '=' ,LeadId)
Set @leadrow2 = row(@rsContact2, 1)
Set @TileIndex2 = field(@leadrow2,'Nurture_Tile2_Counter__c')
set @temp = formatnumber(@TileIndex2,"R")
set @href2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T2", "Tile Index", @temp )
set @src2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T2", "Tile Index", @temp)
Set @TileIndex2 = formatnumber(@TileIndex2,"N")

IF (@TileIndex2 > 4) THEN
set @Result= 1
ELSE
set @Result= Add(@TileIndex2, 1)
ENDIF
set @Result = formatnumber(@Result,"N")
ENDIF

IF(@TaggedTerm == "") THEN
IF(@nurtureSend2 == "") THEN
Set @TileIndex2 = 1
set @href2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T2", "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)
set @src2 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T2", "Tile Index", @TileIndex2)
ENDIF
ENDIF
 
]%%
 
%%=v(@href2)=%%
 
%%[
var @TileIndex3, @nurtureSend3 , @href3, @src3, @rsContacts3, @leadrows3
var @TaggedTerm, @LeadId,@Result, @temp
set @LeadId = LeadId
set @TaggedTerm = SegmentTagTerms

Set @rsContacts3= RetrieveSalesforceObjects('Lead', 'Nurture_Tile3_Counter__c', 'Id', '=' ,LeadId)
Set @leadrows3 = row(@rsContacts3, 1)
Set @nurtureSend3 = field(@leadrows3,'Nurture_Tile3_Counter__c')
 
IF(@TaggedTerm != "") THEN
IF( @nurtureSend3 == "") THEN

IF( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm, "Anxiety/Fear") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex3 = 1
set @href3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T3","Tile Index", @TileIndex3)
set @src3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T3",  "Tile Index", @TileIndex3)

ELSEIF( IndexOf( @TaggedTerm ,"No Hope") > 0 ) THEN
set @TileIndex3 = 2
set @href3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T3", "Tile Index", @TileIndex3)
set @src3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T3",  "Tile Index", @TileIndex3)

ELSEIF ( IndexOf(@TaggedTerm ,"Default") > 0) THEN
set @TileIndex3 = 3
set @href3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T3", "Tile Index", @TileIndex3)
set @src3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T3", "Tile Index", @TileIndex3)

ELSE
set @TileIndex3 = 1
set @href3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T3","Tile Index", @TileIndex3)
set @src3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T3",  "Tile Index", @TileIndex3)

ENDIF
ENDIF
ENDIF

IF( @nurtureSend3 != "") THEN
Set @rsContact3= RetrieveSalesforceObjects('Lead', 'Nurture_Tile3_Counter__c', 'Id', '=' ,LeadId)
Set @leadrow3 = row(@rsContact3, 1)
Set @TileIndex3 = field(@leadrow3,'Nurture_Tile3_Counter__c')
set @temp = formatnumber(@TileIndex3,"R")
set @href3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T3", "Tile Index", @temp )
set @src3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T3", "Tile Index", @temp)
Set @TileIndex3 = formatnumber(@TileIndex3,"N")

IF (@TileIndex3 > 2) THEN
set @Result= 1
ELSE
set @Result= Add(@TileIndex3, 1)
ENDIF
set @Result = formatnumber(@Result,"N")
ENDIF

IF(@TaggedTerm == "") THEN
IF(@@nurtureSend3 == "") THEN
Set @TileIndex3 = 1
set @href3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Href Image", "Tile Value", "T3", "Tile Index", @TileIndex3)
set @src3 = Lookup("TileLogicDE","Src Image", "Tile Value", "T3", "Tile Index", @TileIndex3)
ENDIF
ENDIF
]%%
 
%%=v(@href3)=%%
 
 
%%[
var @LeadId, @EmailName, @LeadStatus, @OpportunityStage, @DateSent, @EmailId, @TopicName, @TopicsSent, @UpdatedTopics
set @LeadId = LeadId
set @EmailName = emailName_
set @LeadStatus = Status
set @OpportunityStage=""
set @DateSent = xtshortdate
set @EmailId= emailaddr
set @TopicName = Lookup('Email_Topic_Mapping_DE','TopicName','EmailName', @EmailName)
set @TopicsSent =  RetrieveSalesforceObjects('Lead', 'Topics_Sent__c', 'Id', '=' , @LeadId)
set @UpdatedTopics = Concat( @TopicName ,';', @TopicsSent)
updateSingleSalesforceObject('Lead', @LeadId, 'Topics_Sent__c', @UpdatedTopics)

InsertDE("JourneyTracking_DE", "LeadId", @LeadId, "EmailName", @EmailName, "LeadStatus", @LeadStatus, "OpportunityStage", @OpporunityStage, "DateSent", @DateSent, "EmailId", @EmailId, "TopicsSent", @TopicsSent, "TopicName", @TopicName)
]%%
 
%%[
var @retrieveLeadRecord, @OwnerID, @limitLeadRow, @retrieveOwnerRecord, @limitOwnerRow, @OwnerName, @OwnerNumber, @OwnerEmail

set @retrieveLeadRecord = RetrieveSalesforceObjects("Lead", "OwnerId","Id", "=", LeadId)
set @limitLeadRow = Row(@retrieveLeadRecord, 1)
set @OwnerID = Field(@limitLeadRow, "OwnerId")

set @retrieveOwnerRecord = RetrieveSalesforceObjects("User", "Name,Phone,Email","Id", "=", @OwnerID)
set @limitOwnerRow = Row(@retrieveOwnerRecord, 1)
set @OwnerName = Field(@limitOwnerRow, "Name")
set @OwnerNumber = Field(@limitOwnerRow, "Phone")
set @OwnerEmail = Field(@limitOwnerRow, "Email")
]%%
 
  %%=v(@OwnerName)=%%

  Patient Advocate

  Cancer Treatment Centers of America(R)

   %%=v(@Address)=%%

   O: %%=v(@OwnerNumber)=%% 

   E: %%=v(@OwnerEmail)=%%

   W: cancercenter.com
https://www.cancercenter.com/
 
  Hospitals
https://www.cancercenter.com/locations?loc=hospitals

7pfjsnolsad.superContent:
Thank you for taking the time to talk with me about your %%=Lowercase(@CancerType)=%% cancer diagnosis. My goal is to make sure you have the information you need to make an informed decision and are aware of the treatment options available to you at Cancer Treatment Centers of America® (CTCA).
To help you get started, I am including a link to a web page that contains information about the advanced treatment options available at our new CTCA® Outpatient Care Center, located in downtown Chicago. new location is easy to travel to by public transportation or by car. You also have access to convenient.

To help you get started, I am including a link to a web page that contains information about the advanced treatment options available at our new CTCA® Outpatient Care Center, located in downtown Chicago. new location is easy to travel to by public transportation or by car. You also have access to convenient.

content.name: Persona1-Msg1
content.textContent:
Cancer-related fatigue is frequently said to be one of the most common and stressful symptoms of living with cancer. So, I wanted to pass along this link to information on cancer-related fatiguethat you.
To help you get started, I am including a link to a web page that contains information about the advanced treatment options available at our new CTCA® Outpatient Care Center, located in downtown Chicago. This new location is easy to travel to by public transportation or by car. You also have access to convenient parking.

content.name: Breast-Msg1
content.textContent: Many organizations offer information and assistance to people living with cancer, but it's sometimes hard to know what resources can offer reliable and trustworthy support. Here is a list of excellent resources that can help you find information about cancer, treatment options, support groups in your community and financial and legal services. I encourage you to reach out to these organizations to learn how they can help you in your cancer journey.

content.name: Colorectal-Msg1
content.textContent: As we discussed, your next step is to complete the CTCA Authorization and Medical History forms. This process is easy to do online using the link below. If you do not have some of the information requested, simply save your work and return to it later. (For example, you should save your work if you need to stop to look up your doctors’ contact information.

content.name: LeadProspect-PhoneDoc Value-Msg1
content.textContent: So that I can schedule your evaluation quickly, please complete these forms as soon as possible and note that after seven days, the link above will expire. If you need assistance or have questions, please contact me directly at my phone number or email address below.
